_sText:
Hi,

this is my second map (the first was [de_dustjump](http://www.gamebanana.com/maps/147563 "de_dustjump")).
It is a snowy village which is cut off from the outside world.
A small map with some wintry evening-flair.

(Sorry for the bad english I'm German.)

This map is for max. 40 Players!


This map was created by: second ich (2011)
_______________________________________________________

Unpack the Zip-file and move the file "de winter village" to:

Steam/SteamApps/"your name"/counter-strike source/cstrike/maps

Have fun
